alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 4:26AM MST until February 02 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts in the foothills. * WHERE...Animas River Basin. * WHEN...From midnight Tuesday night to 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
